channel.title: Npcdialogue help

item.title: Npcdialogue help
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

My npcdialogue works fine the npcs faces move

npcdialogue.jpg520×515

But when the player talks the face doesn’t move, see in the picture

If you can help, or in your server the players face moves, please help me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2008, 07:17:51 am[/size][hr]Btw, this is my code: case 343: sendFrame200(615, 974); sendFrame126(playerName, 975); sendFrame126("Hello", 976); sendFrame126("Who are you?", 977); sendFrame185(974); sendFrame164(973); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2008, 07:50:15 am[/size][hr]And this is my npc code: case 494: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Can I have L33t pl0x??", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

I also have an npc code that makes the npc face not move like the player face: case 301: // Spells of the gods (q3) start point sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Hi there, you look pretty strong,", 4904); sendFrame126("would you like to get a quest?", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
